trans-unit.source: Run commands locally at the command prompt
trans-unit.target: Run commands locally at the command prompt

trans-unit.source: It is helpful to narrow whether a build failure is the result of a TFS/VSTS product issue (agent or tasks).
trans-unit.target: It is helpful to narrow whether a build failure is the result of a TFS/VSTS product issue (agent or tasks).

trans-unit.source: Build failures may also result from external commands.
trans-unit.target: Build failures may also result from external commands.

trans-unit.source: Check the build log for the exact command-line executed by the failing step.
trans-unit.target: Check the build log for the exact command-line executed by the failing step.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to run the command locally from the command line, may reproduce the issue.
trans-unit.target: Attempting to run the command locally from the command line, may reproduce the issue.

trans-unit.source: It can be helpful to run the command locally from your own machine, and/or log-in to the build machine and run the command as the service account.
trans-unit.target: It can be helpful to run the command locally from your own machine, and/or log-in to the build machine and run the command as the service account.

trans-unit.source: For example, is the problem happening during the MSBuild part of your build process (for example, are you using either the MSBuild or Visual Studio Build step)?
trans-unit.target: For example, is the problem happening during the MSBuild part of your build process (for example, are you using either the MSBuild or Visual Studio Build step)?

trans-unit.source: If so, then try running the same MSBuild command on a local machine using the same arguments.
trans-unit.target: If so, then try running the same MSBuild command on a local machine using the same arguments.

trans-unit.source: If you can reproduce the problem on a local machine, then your next steps are to investigate the MSBuild problem.
trans-unit.target: If you can reproduce the problem on a local machine, then your next steps are to investigate the MSBuild problem.

trans-unit.source: For detailed steps, please see the rest of Troubleshooting Build
trans-unit.target: For detailed steps, please see the rest of Troubleshooting Build
